page.title: 04Employment Crosthwaite'area'
page.content: {People}who work from{home}include Farmers; Two Post Office/General Store owners;Caravan Park Warden;Wood Turner; Hairdresser;Weaver; Timber Merchant; Digger Contractor and Staff of the Hotels in the area.Many people {commute.}The most popular place for work is the nearest town,{Kendal}seven miles away. Twelve commute, by{private transport to Kendal-Teacher;Optician;Accountant; Engineer;Leisure Centre Attendant; K.Shoe worker; Golf Club Groundsman; Warehouse Forman and three shop workers. Others commute,by{private {transport,}to other villages/towns a distance varying from{two to eighty miles,for a variety of employment.This ranges between Hotel Workers;an animal nutritionist; an Architect; a Computer Engineer and one person working with mentally handicapped children.
